name: Animal Dentist - Little Baby Pet Doctor Kids Games
name_original: Animal Dentist - Little Baby Pet Doctor Kids Games
description:
***Over 1.2 Million Downloads!!*** Help take care of the baby pet's tooth problems with Animal Dentist Simulator!! Clean teeth for cute kittens, unicorn pony, shark, puppy dog and more!

The little baby animals are always eating lots of food but they are not always brushing and flossing their teeth. Can you help them clean up? Fix the cavities & clean the teeth so they look pearly white!

**Features**
- Many cute different baby Animals & Pets!
- Dentist tools including: Toothbrush, flosser, water-sprayer, suction, tooth coloring, mouth spray and braces!!
- Use your finger, press and hold the braces to pick them up. Drag the braces to the tooth to straighten the crooked teeth.
- Use the Animals book to choose a different animal or pet.
- There are Endless scenarios to complete!!

*Please note that Animal Dentist Simulator is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items, additional characters and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Ninjafish Studios is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.
